rooms.description: Elegant entrance with natural light, leading to the main living space.
Spacious and luxurious living area, featuring large windows for ample daylight.
Integrated dining space with a sleek and modern design.
Open-concept kitchen equipped with energy-efficient appliances, and natural stone countertops.

Fully equipped gym with natural light and eco-friendly flooring options.
Two-car garage with eco-friendly lighting and storage solutions.
